egress.description: Configuration block for egress rules. Can be specified multiple times for each egress rule.
egress.type: list(object({ description: string, from_port: number, to_port: number, protocol: string, cidr_ipv4: string}))

ingress.description: Configuration block for ingress rules. Can be specified multiple times for each ingress rule.
ingress.type: list(object({ description: string, from_port: number, to_port: number, protocol: string, cidr_ipv4: string}))

tags.description: A map of tags to add to the resource
